p: Label-free quantitative proteomics were performed at the Emory Proteomics Core, Emory University, USA. Detailed methods were published elsewhere ( Seyfried et al., 2017). The label free quantitation (LFQ) algorithm in MaxQuant ( Cox and Mann, 2008) was used for protein quantitation. The quantitation method only considered razor and unique peptides for protein level quantitation. The LFQ intensities were log2 transformed for downstream analyses.
